examples.example: 老师鼓励我们积极提出自己的想法和见解。

translate.english: Teachers encourage us to actively put forward our own ideas and opinions.

examples.example: 我勇敢地向领导提出了自己的创新建议。

translate.english: I bravely put forward my own innovative suggestions to the leader.

examples.example: 我在会议上积极提出了一些有利于项目推进的方案。

translate.english: I actively put forward some plans that are beneficial to the progress of the project at the meeting.
